edu.ohiou.labimp.basis
Class Draw2DPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.ohiou.labimp.basis.Draw2DPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable2D, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Draw2DPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Drawable2D

Title: Generic classes for manufacturing planning Description: This project implements general classes for imtelligent manufacturing planning. These are: ImpObject - umbrella class fro all objects MrgPartModel - general part object data Viewable - interface to display objects in applet GUIApplet - applet that utilizes viewable interface Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: Ohio University

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dusan Sormaz
See Also:

addImage

public void addImage(java.awt.Image image,
                     java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform)
This method adds image to the image map for painting. Image should be scaled for the target's space and supplied transform should refer to transfom in the target's coordinates.

Parameters:
image - - the image to be painted
transform - - transform of the image in target's world space
